text: Majed Ahmed Abdullah Al-Mohammed (; born 1 November 1959 in Jeddah) is a retired Saudi Arabian footballer. He played as a striker. He has scored more goals for the Saudi national team than any other player. He was nicknamed the Arabian Pel√©. Abdullah was voted as the best football player in the history of Saudi Arabia in a poll by IBOPE Zogby International. ==References== ==Other websites == * Category:Saudi Arabian footballers Category:Living people Category:People from Jeddah Category:1959 births Category:1988 AFC Asian Cup players Category:1992 AFC Asian Cup players Category:1994 FIFA World Cup players Category:AFC Asian Cup-winning players Category:Asian Games medalists in football Category:Association football forwards Category:Footballers at the 1990 Asian Games Category:Al Nassr FC players
title: Majed Abdullah
